sources.name: Product update memo
sources.content: We shipped a new onboarding flow with fewer steps and clearer pricing. Early tests show a 12% increase in activation and fewer support tickets about billing. Next: add an in-app checklist and improve error messages for failed payments.

sources.name: Meeting notes
sources.content:
Agenda: demo readiness.
- Add sample presets and semantic URLs.
- Ensure errors are user-friendly.
- Add integration tests for UI wiring.
Decision: ship non-LLM tools first, then LLM tools.
Owners: Asha (LLM), Ben (data tools), Chen (tests).
